books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime and the surveillance state.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South during the 1930s.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: A sailor's account of the obsessive quest of Captain Ahab to find the great white whale, Moby Dick.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the excesses of the Jazz Age in the 1920s.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story of a teenage boy's disillusionment with society and the loss of innocence.
